A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie. I genuinely do not understand why so many fans are upset with this movie. I think that a lot of them were disappointed by the fact that things didn't go the way they wanted to go and then proceeded to miss the point of the movie. A lot of them think that Finn's story was pointless because his story arc resulted in failure\, however the movie made a point to point out the fact that people learn from failures\, and Finn's failure resulted in a complete character shift\, so it wasn't pointless. \nKylo\, Luke and Rey's story arc was AMAZING and it was everything I could have wanted. People need to chill out. Rian Johnson did a great job with this movie and I can't wait for his trilogy.
